body_html:
I have set the learning rate to 0.000001 and the results were the same with the tf.contrib.rnn.LayerNormBasicLSTMCell.
The model (using the MNIST dataset ) terminates with an accuracy of 0.078125.
The idea of using the layer norm elsewhere seems to be working pretty good in the case of the speech-recognition task ( the model is much faster and the accuracy are good, still training!!!)
body_text:
I have set the learning rate to 0.000001 and the results were the same with the tf.contrib.rnn.LayerNormBasicLSTMCell.
The model (using the MNIST dataset ) terminates with an accuracy of 0.078125.
The idea of using the layer norm elsewhere seems to be working pretty good in the case of the speech-recognition task ( the model is much faster and the accuracy are good, still training!!!)
body:
I have set the learning rate to `0.000001` and the results were the same with the `tf.contrib.rnn.LayerNormBasicLSTMCell`. 
The model (using the MNIST dataset ) terminates with an accuracy of `0.078125`.
The idea of using the layer norm elsewhere seems to be working pretty good in the case of the speech-recognition task ( the model is much faster and the accuracy are good, still training!!!)
